metadata.name: File and Directory Discovery - MacOS
metadata.comment: Detects usage of system utilities to discover files and directories

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND (lower(process.name) = lower('/usr/bin/file') AND process.cmd_line rlike '\(.\)\{200,\}' OR lower(process.name) = lower('/bin/ls') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-r')) OR lower(process.name) = lower('/usr/bin/find') OR lower(process.name) = lower('/usr/bin/mdfind') OR lower(process.name) = lower('/tree')))

output.summary: Detects usage of system utilities to discover files and directories
